plot: Portrait of the upcoming band Gasolin'. During five days we follow the band in the studio, their flat, shopping in the streets of Christianshavn, as they prepare their second album "Gasolin' 2". Also featuring footage from a live performance at Revolution in Copenhagen from November 1972.
title: Benzindrengene
plot_es: Portrait of the upcoming band Gasolin'. During five days we follow the band in the studio, their flat, shopping in the streets of Christianshavn, as they prepare their second album "Gasolin' 2". Also featuring footage from a live performance at Revolution in Copenhagen from November 1972.
